**Notice Title:** Construct, Deliver and Install Columbaria Units, Regina, SK
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-23-0827/B
**Publication Date:** February 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2023, at 3:00 PM EST

**Overview:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to design, construct, deliver, and install two (2) columbaria units at its Training Academy located in Regina, Saskatchewan. The columbaria units must match or closely resemble the existing columbaria, which are constructed from grey granite (Stanstead Grey) and black granite (Absolute Black).

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of work involves the design, construction, delivery, and installation of two columbaria units. The units must be completed in accordance with the requirements and specifications outlined in the request for proposal. The estimated quantity of the commodity is two (2) units. The duration of the contract is from the contract award date to September 30, 2023.

**Security Requirement:**

The project requires a security clearance, which must be obtained by the contracting party.

**Selection Criteria:**

The lowest compliant bidder will be selected based on the tender submitted.

**Delivery Instructions:**

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at: NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Important Notes:**

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* The RCMP has implemented the Integrity Regime in its contracting activities.
* All amendments, including significant enquiries received and their replies, will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).
